nodes.text: Gates Harnik was a Human male grocer supplying the local resistance on the planet of Cilpar in 4 ABY.

When Moff Boren Tascl destroyed the town of Tamarack, they captured Harnik and hung him from the ruins of the city. His brief funeral was presided over by Cilpari Resistance leader Elscol Loro, and his body was cremated by fellow resistance member Chang.
